speaker: Gary
name: Gary
dialog: Hey! Who turned out the light?! Damn! Right before finals too.

speaker: Virgil
dialog: Quiet, my child. Be not afraid. I am Virgil.

speaker: Virgil
name: Virgil
dialog: A student here has made a dire mistake. The Book of the Dead, the Necronomicon, has been left unsealed!

speaker: Virgil
name: Virgil
dialog: Demons have lept from its pages and are rampaging throughout the school. Luckily, they are contained within the university for now, but we don't have much time.

speaker: Gary
name: Gary
dialog: WE! How can I even help?! I'm just a student here.

speaker: Virgil
name: Virgil
dialog: Well, nobody else is still here at this hour! SO I DON'T REALLY HAVE A CHOICE, DO I?!

speaker: Virgil
name: Virgil
dialog: Excuse me... Ahem. Dearest Gary. The demons have ripped the ritual pages from the Necronomicon, and hidden them throughout the school.

speaker: lantern_virgil
name: Virgil
dialog: Take this holy lantern to light your path through the darkness. Use its light to outsmart those dreadful demons, find the missing ritual pages to send those bastards back to Hell.
